rules: Strictly no hacks or 3rd party tools.
Emulator players are not allowed unless specified.
Must join the room 10 minutes before the start.
Screen recording is recommended for dispute resolution.
Prize will be distributed within 24 hours of match completion.

tournaments.name: Weekend Battle Royale
tournaments.description: Intense solo combat on Bermuda map. Show your survival skills!

tournaments.name: Duo Dominance
tournaments.description: Team up with your best mate and rule the battlefield.
